ComicInfo.Title: Gob; Wonder Woman; The Utterly Insane Lunatic; Hey, Mr. Spaceman; Pop Culturama; Where Has It Gone, All the Beautiful Music of Our Grandparents?; Is She "Born Again"?... ...Or Born to Raise Hell Again?; Life Certainly Is "Existential"!; The Tot; In Heaven; She's All Wet Down There!; Watch Out New York! There's a New Girl in Town!; Prayin' Won't Do Her No Damn Good! She's a Hopeless Case!

ComicInfo.Summary:
Dips into the life of a monster
Wonder Woman as you've never seen her.
Doodles has a cold.
No luck for Madame X
Farmer Brown is inspired.
The lunatic has to buy a new washer
An alien visitation.
A monster discusses trash culture
Crumb bemoans modern popular music.
Martini gets married and encounters religion.
The demon thinks he hears a damsel in distress.
The boys play "Mutiny on the Bounty."
What makes life existential?
A priest plots to become archbishop.
The joys of heaven.
